text: Lee Joo-young (born February 14, 1992) is a South Korean actress. Her most notable appearances are in the television series Weightlifting Fairy Kim Bok- joo (2016–17) and Itaewon Class (2020). ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !
